summary: This document contains a series of emails and correspondence related to the purchase and registration of two Sikorsky helicopters (N722JE and N162AE). It includes discussions about escrow arrangements, title searches, and the involvement of various parties including attorneys and escrow agents. The document highlights the financial transactions and legal requirements necessary for the aircraft sales. This document contains various wire transfer records and deposit confirmations related to aircraft transactions involving Insured Aircraft Title Service, Inc. and other entities. It highlights significant financial transactions, including deposits for aircraft purchases and the establishment of escrow accounts. This document contains multiple Priority Search Certificates issued by the International Registry for International Interests in Mobile Equipment, specifically related to aircraft equipment. It details various transactions involving aircraft and their ownership changes, particularly focusing on the entity 'Freedom Air International, Inc.' and its previous name 'Air Ghislaine, Inc.' The document also includes FAA records searches for specific aircraft and engines. This document contains various Aircraft Title Reports from FAA records searches related to aircraft owned by or associated with Jeffrey Epstein and others. It details ownership, lien status, and financial transactions involving aircraft and related services. The document highlights significant financial disbursements and escrow instructions related to aircraft transactions. This document contains a series of emails and agreements related to the sale of aircraft between ASI Wings LLC and Freedom Air International, Inc. It details financial transactions, escrow arrangements, and communication between various parties involved in the sale, including attorneys and escrow agents. The document highlights the complexities of the transaction and the financial amounts involved. This document is a letter agreement related to the purchase of a Sikorsky S-76C helicopter and associated engines between ASI Wings LLC and Freedom Air International, Inc. It outlines the obligations of the seller to correct inspection discrepancies and the financial arrangements regarding the purchase price, including escrow details. This document contains various email communications and agreements related to the purchase of aircraft between ASI Wings, LLC and Freedom Air International, Inc. It includes wire instructions, delivery receipts, and acceptance certificates for Sikorsky helicopters. The document highlights the financial transactions and legal agreements involved in the aircraft purchase process. This document outlines the Aircraft Purchase Agreement between ASI Wings, LLC and Freedom Air International, Inc. for the sale of a Sikorsky S-76C helicopter. It details the terms of the sale, including the purchase price, conditions of the aircraft, escrow arrangements, and responsibilities of both parties. The agreement is significant as it involves a high-value transaction and includes various legal stipulations regarding the aircraft's condition and ownership transfer. This document contains various letters of intent and agreements related to the purchase of Sikorsky S-76C++ helicopters, detailing specifications, purchase agreements, and correspondence between involved parties. It includes information about the aircraft's condition, equipment, and legal documentation required for the transactions. This document contains correspondence regarding the registration and transfer of aircraft ownership between various parties, including Freedom Air International, Inc. and ASI Wings, LLC. It details the application to change aircraft registration numbers and includes a warranty bill of sale for a Sikorsky S-76 helicopter. This document contains various communications and transaction statements related to the aircraft N722JE and N162AE, including escrow details and registration applications. It highlights the involvement of multiple parties in the sale and purchase of these aircraft, as well as the necessary documentation for their registration. This document is a warranty bill of sale for a Sikorsky S-76C helicopter sold by Freedom Air International Inc. to ASI Wings, LLC. It details the ownership transfer, the condition of the aircraft, and the legal assurances provided by the seller. This document contains a series of emails regarding the authorization requests for aircraft objects on behalf of ASI Wings, LLC and Freedom Air International, Inc. It discusses the approval and revocation of authorizations for various aircraft engines and highlights the roles of individuals involved in the process. This document contains email correspondence primarily between Tonya Butler and Ted Osgood regarding the registration of aircraft with the International Registry. It discusses the urgency of completing the registration process for specific helicopters, highlighting the involvement of Insured Aircraft Title Service, Inc. and the need for timely action due to upcoming travel plans. This document contains a series of emails and reports related to financial transactions involving aircraft purchases, specifically a Sikorsky S-76C helicopter. It details the escrow arrangements, deposit confirmations, and communications between various parties involved in the transaction, including payment details and confirmations of receipt. This document contains multiple priority search certificates issued by the International Registry of International Interests in Aircraft Equipment, detailing sales and ownership changes of aircraft and engines associated with Freedom Air International, Inc. and ASI Wings, LLC. It includes information on the registration and title of aircraft and engines, as well as the entities involved in these transactions. This document contains email correspondence regarding the title searches for aircraft N722JE and its associated engines. It includes discussions about the entities involved in the sales agreement and banking instructions for escrow funds. The document highlights the change of name for a seller entity and provides details about the aircraft's registration and ownership. This document outlines the purchase agreement for a Sikorsky S-76C helicopter between ASI Wings LLC as the seller and Hyperion Air, LLC as the buyer. It details the terms of sale, including the purchase price, payment structure, and conditions for the aircraft's delivery and inspection. This document contains various communications and records related to the aircraft registration and maintenance of a Sikorsky S-76C helicopter, including inspection reports, discrepancies, and corrective actions taken. It also includes a delivery and acceptance certificate for the aircraft between Hyperion Air, LLC and ASI Wings LLC, along with warranty and registration details. The document appears to be a confidential authorization request related to the Epstein case, but the text is garbled and lacks substantive content for analysis. This document contains various communications related to the aircraft registration and escrow processes for the helicopter N722JE, including details about deposits, title searches, and correspondence between involved parties. It highlights the involvement of Jeffrey Epstein and others in the ownership and management of the aircraft. This document contains a chain of title report for the aircraft with registration number N722JE, detailing ownership changes and lien status. It includes information about the current and previous owners, as well as the FAA records related to the aircraft and its engines. This document contains a series of emails regarding the escrow and disbursement of funds related to the purchase of a helicopter (N722JE) by Helicopter 1029 LLC from Hyperion Air LLC. It includes wiring instructions, confirmation of deposit assignments, and discussions about the termination of the purchase agreement. This document outlines the terms and conditions under which IATS operates as an escrow agent for transactions involving the purchase and sale of aircraft. It specifies the responsibilities of the transacting parties, the limitations of IATS's liability, and the jurisdiction for disputes. The document emphasizes that IATS will not be responsible for the contents of contracts and will charge fees for handling transactions. This document outlines the terms of an aircraft purchase agreement between Hyperion Air, LLC and Helicopter 1029, LLC for a Sikorsky S-76C helicopter. It details the purchase price, conditions of the aircraft, escrow arrangements, and responsibilities of both parties regarding the transaction. This document outlines the terms and conditions for transactions involving the purchase and sale of aircraft, specifically detailing the responsibilities and liabilities of IATS in relation to escrow services. It emphasizes that IATS is not responsible for the contents of contracts and outlines procedures for handling disputes and fees associated with failed transactions. This document contains various communications and agreements related to the sale of a helicopter (N722JE) involving multiple parties, including escrow agreements, bills of sale, and correspondence between individuals regarding the transaction. It highlights the roles of various individuals in the sale process and the legal documentation involved. This document appears to be a report detailing the availability of N-Numbers for aircraft assignments as of November 13, 2019. It includes multiple pages of N-Numbers, which are identifiers used for aircraft registration in the United States. The document is marked as confidential and subject to a protective order. This document contains various communications and records related to the sale of an aircraft associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It includes details about the ownership of Hyperion Air, LLC, and mentions transactions involving the aircraft N7221E. The document highlights the involvement of several individuals in the escrow process and the complexities surrounding the sale due to Epstein's legal issues. This document contains an Aircraft Title Report from FAA records regarding the aircraft with registration number N722JE. It details the engine specifications and confirms that there are no liens recorded against the engine. The report is prepared for Insured Aircraft Title Service, LLC and includes disclaimers about the accuracy of the FAA records. This document contains a series of emails and correspondence related to the purchase of a Sikorsky S-76C++ helicopter, including disbursement instructions and escrow details. It highlights the financial transactions and parties involved in the sale, including the roles of various individuals in the escrow process.

events.title: Closing of Aircraft Transactions
events.description: The closing for the purchase of helicopters N722JE and N162AE was scheduled to take place.

events.title: Rescheduled Closing
events.description: The closing for the aircraft transactions was postponed and rescheduled for July 26, 2011.

events.title: Escrow Instructions Sent
events.description: Escrow instructions for the aircraft transactions were sent to the involved parties.

events.title: Deposit Confirmation
events.description: A deposit of $100,000 was confirmed for the purchase of an aircraft, held in a special escrow account.

events.title: Deposit Confirmation
events.description: A deposit of $100,000 was confirmed from Aetna Inc. towards the purchase of an aircraft.

events.title: Deposit Confirmation
events.description: A deposit of $100,000 was confirmed from Aetna Inc. towards the purchase of an aircraft.

events.title: Wire Transfer
events.description: A wire transfer of $11,803,902.50 was made to Insured Aircraft Title Service.

events.title: Priority Search Certificate Issued
events.description: Multiple Priority Search Certificates were issued for aircraft transactions involving Freedom Air International, Inc.

events.title: Name Change Notification
events.description: The entity 'Air Ghislaine, Inc.' changed its name to 'Freedom Air International, Inc.'

events.title: Contract of Sale
events.description: A contract of sale was executed involving Aetna Life Insurance Company and ASI Wings, LLC for aircraft.

events.title: Funds Received
events.description: A total of $13,408,847.50 was received from various parties including Aetna Inc. and Jeffrey Epstein for aircraft transactions.

events.title: Escrow Release
events.description: Escrow funds were released according to the directions of Aetna and other parties involved in the aircraft transactions.

events.title: Closing of Aircraft Sale
events.description: The closing of the sale of Sikorsky S-76C helicopters between ASI Wings LLC and Freedom Air International, Inc. is finalized.

events.title: Letter Agreement for Helicopter Purchase
events.description: A letter agreement was executed modifying the terms of the Aircraft Purchase Agreement regarding the Sikorsky S-76C helicopter and associated engines.

events.title: Aircraft Purchase Agreement
events.description: An Aircraft Purchase Agreement was established between ASI Wings, LLC and Freedom Air International, Inc. for the sale of a Sikorsky S-76C helicopter.

events.title: Delivery of Aircraft
events.description: The delivery of the Sikorsky S-76C helicopter was acknowledged by Freedom Air International, Inc.

events.title: Aircraft Purchase Agreement Signed
events.description: The Aircraft Purchase Agreement between ASI Wings, LLC and Freedom Air International, Inc. was executed.

events.title: Letter of Intent Expiration
events.description: The Letter of Intent regarding the purchase of the Sikorsky S-76C++ helicopter will expire if not accepted by this date.

events.title: Certificate of Aircraft Registration Issued
events.description: The FAA issued a certificate of registration for the Sikorsky S-76C helicopter to Freedom Air International, Inc.

events.title: Aircraft Registration Change Application
events.description: Application to change the registration of aircraft N162AE to N162AD and reserve it back to ASI Wings, LLC.

events.title: Warranty Bill of Sale Execution
events.description: Execution of a warranty bill of sale for the transfer of ownership of a Sikorsky S-76 helicopter from ASI Wings, LLC to Freedom Air International, Inc.

events.title: Documents in Escrow
events.description: Documents related to the aircraft N722JE and N162AE were held in escrow as part of the transaction process.

events.title: Sale of Helicopter
events.description: The helicopter was sold from Freedom Air International Inc. to ASI Wings, LLC.

events.title: Registration of Helicopter
events.description: The helicopter and its engines were registered with the International Registry.

events.title: Authorization Requests for Aircraft Objects
events.description: Multiple authorization requests were processed for aircraft engines on behalf of ASI Wings, LLC and Freedom Air International, Inc.

events.title: Aircraft Registration Urgency
events.description: Email correspondence discussing the urgency of completing the registration of aircraft for upcoming travel needs.

events.title: Deposit Confirmation for Helicopter Purchase
events.description: A deposit of $500,000 was confirmed as received into escrow for the purchase of a Sikorsky S-76C helicopter.

events.title: Final Payment for Helicopter Purchase
events.description: A final payment of $2,501,700 was processed for the purchase of the helicopter.

events.title: Aircraft Sale
events.description: The aircraft N722JE was sold from Freedom Air International, Inc. to ASI Wings, LLC.

events.title: Name Change
events.description: Air Ghislaine, Inc. changed its name to Freedom Air International, Inc.

events.title: FAA Records Search
events.description: FAA records search revealed title information on the aircraft N722JE and its previous ownership.

events.title: Aircraft Purchase Agreement Signed
events.description: The purchase agreement for the Sikorsky S-76C helicopter was signed between ASI Wings LLC and Hyperion Air, LLC.

events.title: Closing Call for Aircraft Sale
events.description: A closing call was scheduled to finalize the sale of the aircraft, involving key representatives from both parties.

events.title: Aircraft Closing
events.description: Closing on the sale of the Sikorsky S-76C helicopter with registration N722JE.

events.title: Final Inspection
events.description: Final inspections conducted by Russell Landon Scott and Anthony Tirone on the aircraft.

events.title: Deposit Confirmation for N722JE
events.description: A deposit of $100,000 was confirmed for the purchase of the aircraft N722JE.

events.title: Tentative Closing Date for N722JE
events.description: A tentative closing date was set for the purchase of the aircraft N722JE.

events.title: Authorization for Aircraft Work
events.description: Authorization was granted for work on the aircraft N722JE.

events.title: Aircraft Sale
events.description: The aircraft N722JE was sold from ASI Wings, LLC to Hyperion Air, LLC.

events.title: Aircraft Registration
events.description: The aircraft N722JE was registered under the ownership of Hyperion Air, LLC.

events.title: Priority Search Certificate Issued
events.description: A priority search certificate was issued for the aircraft N722JE.

events.title: Purchase Agreement Date
events.description: The purchase and sale agreement for the Keystone helicopter was dated November 1, 2019.

events.title: Disbursement Instructions
events.description: Disbursement instructions for the $100,000 deposit were communicated, detailing how the funds should be allocated.

events.title: Termination of Purchase Agreement
events.description: The parties mutually agreed to terminate the purchase and sale agreement for the helicopter.

events.title: Aircraft Purchase Agreement Signed
events.description: The purchase agreement for the Sikorsky S-76C helicopter was executed between Hyperion Air, LLC and Helicopter 1029, LLC.

events.title: Closing Date
events.description: The closing of the purchase and sale of the aircraft is scheduled to occur on this date, contingent upon the correction of discrepancies.

events.title: Aircraft Purchase Agreement
events.description: An Aircraft Purchase Agreement was executed between Hyperion Air, LLC and Helicopter 1029, LLC for the sale of the helicopter.

events.title: Written Consent of Sole Member
events.description: The Estate of Jeffrey E. Epstein, through its Co-Executors, approved the sale of the helicopter.

events.title: Assignment of Deposit
events.description: Harry Macklowe assigned a deposit to Helicopter 1029, LLC for the purchase of the helicopter.

events.title: Aircraft Sale Communication
events.description: Communication regarding the sale of the aircraft N7221E, including discussions about the buyer and escrow details.

events.title: Aircraft Registration
events.description: Hyperion Air, LLC is registered to manage the aircraft, with Jeffrey Epstein listed as the sole member.

events.title: Aircraft Title Registration
events.description: The aircraft N7221E is registered under Hyperion Air, LLC, with Lawrence Visoski as the manager.

events.title: Letter of Intent for Helicopter Purchase
events.description: A Letter of Intent was issued by Black Air 777 Group PLC to purchase a Sikorsky S-76C++ helicopter from Hyperion Air, LLC.

events.title: Escrow Instructions and Payment
events.description: Instructions for the escrow payment of $150,000 were communicated to secure the helicopter purchase.
